    • Constructor Detail

      • IpLinkInterface

        public IpLinkInterface(IpLink link)
        Creates a new interface. The interface address and prefix length are dynamically obtained from the link through the method IpLink.nextAddressPrefix().
        Parameters:
        link - the link to be attached to

      • IpLinkInterface

        public IpLinkInterface(IpLink link,
                       IpAddress ip_addr)
        Creates a new interface. The interface address and prefix length are dynamically obtained from the link through the method IpLink.nextAddressPrefix().
        Parameters:
        link - the link to be attached to
        ip_addr - the IP address

        Returns:
        the new link interfaces
